address: Xã Bản Cầm, Huyện Bảo Thắng, Tỉnh Lào Cai
thought:
**Analyzing the Administrative Restructuring of "Xã Bản Cầm"**

Alright, let's break this down. The user's given me an address: "Xã Bản Cầm" in "Tỉnh Lào Cai." My task is to map this old address to its new administrative unit.

First, I identified the key components: "Xã Bản Cầm" as the old ward and "Tỉnh Lào Cai" as the province.  I immediately need to check any resolutions regarding "Tỉnh Lào Cai" itself, to see if there have been any mergers. I quickly found Resolution 60-NQ/TW, which confirms that "Tỉnh Lào Cai" remained intact after merging with "Tỉnh Yên Bái."  Good, that simplifies things.

Next, I zeroed in on the specifics regarding "Xã Bản Cầm" within "Tỉnh Lào Cai."  This led me to Resolution 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15, a key document for administrative restructuring in the area.  Line 41 of that resolution is the gold mine: it explicitly states that "Xã Bản Cầm" was merged with "thị trấn Nông trường Phong Hải" to form a new ward called "Xã Phong Hải."  Perfect.

Now, it's time to cross-reference with our "New Wards" data.  I quickly searched for "Xã Phong Hải" within "Tỉnh Lào Cai," and sure enough, found a direct match:  `{"ward_code":"02902","ward_name":"Xã Phong Hải","province_name":"Tỉnh Lào Cai"}`.

So, the new ward is clearly "Xã Phong Hải" in "Tỉnh Lào Cai."  The JSON output will be straightforward:  a citation to Resolution 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15, Line 41, a high confidence level (given the direct wording of the resolution), the province name ("Tỉnh Lào Cai"), and the ward code and name derived from the "New Wards" data.

Just to be thorough, I quickly checked Resolution 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15 for other relevant details or potential conflicts. I also made sure to confirm there were no other relevant mentions of "Xã Bản Cầm" or related units. I also confirmed Resolution 1678/NQ-UBTVQH15 wasn't applicable. Nothing else of importance emerged. That confirms that line 41 from resolution 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15 is the only relevant one.

In short, "Xã Bản Cầm" is now part of "Xã Phong Hải" in "Tỉnh Lào Cai," and I can confidently provide that information.

citation.header: 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lào Cai
citation.line: 41. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Nông trường Phong Hải và xã Bản Cầm thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Phong Hải.
